news_header: Iran executed 975 people last year, using death penalty for political repression and various crimes.
news_original_title: Iran teloitutti viime vuonna miltei tuhat ihmistä
news_text: In 2022, Iran executed at least 975 individuals, the highest number since 2008, using the death penalty for political repression and various crimes, including murder and drug trafficking. Activists claim vague charges target dissidents, with two executions linked to protests after Mahsa Amin's death.
